name: Plutto
headline: Verify and validate business customers in minutes for LatAm.
description: Plutto gathers all the information and documents needed to verify and identify any business in LatAm. We process this information and provide insights to your on-boarding or compliance teams so they can make better decisions. This increases on-boarding speed from weeks to minutes and automates highly manual processes such as requesting and reading documents.

founders.name: Antonia San Martin, Founder
founders.description:
Worked at Heineken and Nike.
Co-founded a travel startup for 1 year.
Now I’m CEO @ Plutto, building verification service for businesses in Latin America.

founders.name: Felipe Domínguez, Founder
founders.description:
Fullstack Dev for some years, now co-founder @ Plutto. 
I spend a lot of time in the mountains.

founders.name: Ignacio Márquez, Founder
founders.description:
Graduated as Software Engineer. Worked a couple years as a full-stack developer and scrum master in Platanus, Chile. Co-founded a travel startup for 1 year.

Now I'm CTO @ Plutto, building KYB solutions for Latin America.

generated_description:
**Plutto: Revolutionizing Business Verification in Latin America**

Founded in 2022 and nestled in the vibrant city of Santiago, Chile, Plutto is poised to transform how businesses in Latin America get verified and validated. As part of the Y Combinator Batch S22, this fintech company is on a mission to streamline processes, reducing onboarding times from weeks to mere minutes. 

Plutto offers a smart solution by gathering all the essential information and documents to verify business identities. It processes this data efficiently, providing critical insights to compliance and onboarding teams—empowering them to make informed decisions quickly. This automation decreases the tedious, manual workload associated with document handling. 

With a team of 12 dedicated employees led by Group Partner Brad Flora, Plutto is rapidly making a name for itself as the #1 provider in B2B evaluations across LATAM for 2023. They focus on sectors ranging from banking to retail, impacting how businesses manage supplier and client verification through their technology-driven approach. 

The services encompass various features such as vendor due diligence, Know Your Business (KYB) compliance for banks, and automatic alerts for risk assessment, all utilizing advanced AI capabilities. Their platform boasts a significant reduction in operational workload—up to 80%—which translates to fantastic efficiency for organizations navigating the complexity of compliance.

Clients are already singing their praises, citing significant time savings and enhanced operational workflows. Plutto not only simplifies the due diligence process but also enables businesses to manage risk better without the hassle of overwhelming manual work.

For those interested in transforming their verification processes and enhancing business efficiency, you can find more about Plutto at [getplutto.com](https://getplutto.com).

In summary, Plutto stands as an inspiring example of how fintech can be harnessed to provide robust, quick, and reliable validation solutions in the dynamic landscape of Latin American business.
